title: Worst Investigator in Salem

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone. You will learn their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't receive night feedback.
- When you die, your last will will be automatically be filled out with your targets and their roles.

desc:
Post 1952
*So, listen, I'm never been the best at this, but...*
